Path to Twinrova.Spirit Temple Early Adult Right Chest: Small Key Ring (Bottom of the Well)

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Deku Stick# and #the Song of Storms#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern MQ GS Back Area

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #Nayru's Love#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern MQ Deku Scrub Lobby Front

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Purple Rupee#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that plundering #the Thieves' Hideout# is a foolish choice.

GC (Maze).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #a Red Potion Bottle# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #riding the bean in Lake Hylia# leads to...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #the Biggoron Sword#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that ##the Market## has #2# major items.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #Arrows (10 pieces)# can be found in #the Market#.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 2 Bottom

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right and left hands# lie...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Heart Container#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #Deku Stick Capacity# can be found at #Lon Lon Ranch#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Heart Container#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: Did you know that Stalchildren leave you alone when wearing the Bunny Hood?

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that plundering #the Graveyard# is a foolish choice.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Megaton Hammer#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# hoards #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Recovery Heart#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that ##inside Ganon's Castle## has #1# major item.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that the #Flare Dancer atop the Fire Temple# guards a chest containing #a Piece of Heart#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple MQ Chest On Fire

LH (Southwest Corner).text: Did you know that Barinade, Volvagia and Twinrova hard require the Boomerang, Megaton Hammer and Mirror Shield, respectively?

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #a Piece of Heart# can be found at #Gerudo Valley#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that Twinrova always casts the same spell the first three times.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Jabu Jabus Belly MQ Second Room Upper Chest

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Strength Upgrade#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #Darunia's dance# leads to #a Piece of Heart#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Purple Rupee#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Heart Container#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Recovery Heart#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that the #Light Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that plundering #the Water Temple# is a foolish choice.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Strength Upgrade#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #Gerudo Valley# is on the path to #Twinrova#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Megaton Hammer#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: ZR Near Open Grotto Freestanding PoH
